name: 郭志宇
objective: This course contents heat transfer and its applications. Students should not only learn the theory, but also learn how to face the problems that occur in the chemical process, such as which heat transfer method should be used, when maintaining the reaction system at the optimal operating temperature, and wow to design a heat transfer device suitable for the purpose.
schedule:
Week/Process
1st     Introduction of Heat Transfer/Heat Transfer by Conduction
2nd    Heat Transfer by Conduction
3rd     Heat Transfer by Conduction
4th     Convective Heat Transfer
5th     Convective Heat Transfer
6th     Convective Heat Transfer
7th     Radiation Heat Transfer
8th     Radiation Heat Transfer
9th     Midterm Exam
10th   Review for the Midterm
11th    Heat Transfer With Phase Change
12th    Heat Transfer With Phase Change
13th    Heat Transfer With Phase Change
14th    Heat Transfer Equipment
15th    Heat Transfer Equipment
16th    Heat Transfer Equipment
17th    Evaporation
18th    Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quizzes: 25% 
Midterm Exam: 35%
Final Exam: 40%
materials:
Text Book
1. Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering, 7th edition, Warren L. McCabe, Julian C.Smith and Peter Harriott, 東華書局

Reference Book
1. Transport Phenomena, Revised 2nd Edition, R. Byron Bird , Warren E. Stewart, Edwin N. Lightfoot, 高立圖書
2. Fundamentals of Momentum, Heat and Mass Transfer 5th Edition,  James Welty, Charles E. Wicks, Robert E. Wilson, Gregory L. Rorrer
3. 化工單元操作(二) 熱傳．熱傳操作, 呂維明, 許瑞祺, 巫鴻章, 高立圖書
